game.name: Zombie Hunter Lemmy
game.description:
Are you ready to witness the biggest zombie apocalypse ever? Do you want to practice your shooting abilities to clean the area from the unexpected dead attack? If yes, you have reached at a right place for sure. We have today got you covered with a brand new action-packed challenge where you have to save your planet against a horde of deadly monsters. Click the play button and be prepared to guide your hero Lemmy to face off the zombie attack safely!

Be careful as the entire planet has been invaded by a great number of blood-thirsty monsters! You would find no one else there expect the dangerous zombies who will take your lives in a second. Remember you would have only three lives to lose so try to clear them all till the last one is present. Try to open your eyes as they will attack you from any directions in this HTML5 shooting game! Fight like a champion to stay for as long as possible to create your best score!

You can play it in your PC by using the left mouse button (LMB) or explore it in your mobile phone by touching the screen. No, you do not need to install any particular app or download games in your device to find some funny hours. Open it in your device that includes a proper internet connect and allow yourself to enjoy the immersive fighting experience without download! Do not forget to browse our wider collection of free shooter challenges to keep you occupied for hours.
